commit message: Stored 1 and 0 strings to avoid memory allocation
Add the OpenJDK Deque interface and ArrayDeque class
Switched to an ArrayDeque implementation for major memory improvements

Switched to an ArrayList implementation for storing the sequences

Switching to an ArrayList implemenation allows O(1) access and avoids
the need to allocate memory for an iterator
Fixed a bug in the get method of ArrayDeque
Made BitSequence blur 1/4 of the time
Tweaked display settings

Fixed BitSequence leak

When the screen was rotated, all the previous BitSequences were
cleared from the list. However, they were not paused, so they
continued to run in the background. They may have stopped running
after garbage collection, but this was not tested.
Added HoloEverywhere as a library
Fixed IllegalArgumentException bug by only drawing when visible
Added SettingsActivity with SeekBarPreference for the number of bits
Added a preference to control the number of bits
Added stub preferences for speed and text size
Fixed bugs in custom SeekBar preferences
Implemented speed changes and resetting to defaults
Added ColorPickerPreference as a submodule and added the preference to the SettingsActivity
Reset ColorPickerPreference when Reset to Defaults is pressed
Made bit color use color set in preferences
Implemented immediate setting of settings after changes
Made the reset occur for the preview and for the actual wallpaper
Updated HoloEverywhere submodule
Fixed the HoloEverywhere classpath
Fixed reset bug

Fixed memory leak

ScheduledThreadPoolExecutors can not be garbage collected until the
shutdown() method has been called on it. This is now fixed.
Update version to 1.4 and version code to 5
